title: Alimens & Gentle Men's Plaid Button Down Shirts Cotton Long Sleeve Dress Shirts Regular Fit Gingham Shirts
description: Premium Fabric: The long sleeve plaid shirt is made of high-quality 100% cotton, make you stay comfy, perfect for all seasons.
Classic Design: Mens button down shirts feature a button down collar design, adjustable cuffs, back pleat, and patch pocket, provide a classic and trendy look. Multiple plaid pattern to choose from.
Match: You can pair the casual plaid shirts with dress or casual pants for a stylish look, wear untucked on the weekend, tucked for date night or work.
Occasion: This regular fit plaid shirt is perfect for business, work, date, casual, vacation, Christmas party. A perfect gift for family, friends and boyfriend.
Easy Care Instructions: Cotton plaid shirts are machine and hand washable, please hold up well after washing. Please refer to our size chart before ordering to ensure the perfect fit.
